title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to the device onboarding page
description: This adds new enhancements to the device onboarding page, including these: search by IP address to look up devices, filter using the new "Valid user" filter, use a refined device list to only include devices that can be DLP supported (exclude Android devices from showing in the device onboarding list), and use new properties in the export report (valid user, first onboarded date, MDATP device ID, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, Endpoint DLP status, last policy sync time, and Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded).
